RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 1 1 1/16M Turf CR: 92. Claiming Purse 55000. (UP TO $9,570 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000 (1.5% Aftercare Asses sment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track). (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SMOKIN' HOT KITTY three then two wide through the first turn, chased the spurting leader two to three wide among the front of the main flight, advanced on the once clear leader midway on the turn, took over command near the quarter pole and was roused spinning three wide into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive kept to task. MY LION (GB) chased just off the inside from just off the pace, got set down angled four wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one, ran on to secure the place honors. FROM HELLO settled just off the inside near the rear of the field, remained patiently handled until set down angled six wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick to secure the show honors. FAST KIMMIE coaxed from the gate, led early on before being displaced by ROSEMARY POTATOES just inside six and a half furlongs to run, tracked that spurting away leader along the inside on hold until placed to coaxing near the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, stayed on one paced through to the finish. ELLE EST FORTE coaxed from the gate, saved ground in pursuit from mid pack, got let out angled three to four wide into upper stretch, made no headway. STRAND OF GOLD saved ground near the rear of the field, got set down angled just off the inside into upper stretch, offered no response. LADY FIREFOOT five then four wide into the first turn, tucked briefly three wide before heading into the backstretch, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, angled six wide into upper stretch and offered no rally. RED HOT CHICK coaxed from the gate, raced three then two wide through the first turn, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch and tired. SWEET SENSATION just off the inside near the rear early on, altered out three wide into the first turn when briefly off the heels of FROM HELLO, chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went seven wide into upper stretch and tired. ROSEMARY POTATOES forwardly placed four then three wide through the opening turn, took over command just inside six and a half furlongs to go and tucked inside spurting away to a clear lead down the backstretch, tipped briefly to the two path into the far turn before taking back to the rail midway and came under challenge as the field took closer order inside the five-sixteenths, got displaced taking the inside route into upper stretch and folded.

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Kimmie
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, led early, tracked ins, asked 2w 1/4p, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Strand of Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd near rear, set down angled 2w 1/4p, no response

ENTRY.NAME: My Lion (GB)

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of NEW

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, set down 4w upper, no match, ran on

ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p near rear, set down angled 6w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Elle Est Forte
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, saved grd mid pack, let out 3-4w upper, no headway

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Sensation
ENTRY.COMMENT: altered 3w into 1st turn, chased 3-4w, angled 7w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Smokin' Hot Kitty
ENTRY.OWNER: America's Pastimes Stables Liberty House Racing and Mic Duff Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2w 1st turn, chased 2-3w, up roused 3w upper, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Red Hot Chick
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 3-2w 1st turn, chased 2-3w, angled 5w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Firefoot
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-4w 1st turn, chased 3-2w, coaxed 6w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Rosemary Potatoes
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w 1st turn, up ins 6 1/2, spurted away ins, yield 1/4, folded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 36000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races In 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race In 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Afte rcare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUE ELLEN MISHKIN broke very fast then quickly sped clear, was challenged to her inside briefly near the nine-sixteenths then had that foe back off, controlled the action in the two path on the turn, passed the five-sixteenths under coaxing, responded well when asked for more coming to the quarter-pole, extended the advantage under a right-handed crop in upper stretch and proved best under strong urging. DIVA BANKER moved up then tracked the pace on the outside, chased in the three path on the turn, spun four wide into the stretch, pursued the winner in the drive and was second best. BEAUTIFUL KAREN tossed hear slightly at the start, moved up to make a brief bid inside of the winner at the nine-sixteenths then was eased back at the half-mile pole, saved ground on the turn, was given her cue at the five-sixteenths and came up empty while best of the rest. ALPINE QUEEN was hustled from the gate then urged along between foes, moved from the two path to the four path on the turn, was roused late on that bend, came five wide into the stretch and failed to respond. BACKED BY GOLD was urged along between foes past the five-eighths then inside of a rival, moved from the rail to the two path on the turn and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Beautiful Karen
ENTRY.OWNER: Rodriguez Rudy R Imperio Michael and Scuderi Vincent S
ENTRY.COMMENT: tossed head tad brk,mvd up,brief bid4-1/2,eased back,ins,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Backed by Gold
ENTRY.OWNER: Thummps Racing Stable LLC and Jacoutot Peter
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along between,ins foe 1/2,ins-2path turn,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Alpine Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,urged between,2-4path turn,5w into lane,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Sue Ellen Mishkin
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk fast,sped clear,challenged briefly4-1/2,2p turn,responded,clr

ENTRY.NAME: Diva Banker
ENTRY.OWNER: Blu Boy Racing Stables LLC On The Rise Again Stable and Hardoon Joseph R
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd up,tracked outside,chased 3path turn,4p1/4,2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 92. Claiming Purse 72000. INNER TURF (UP TO $12,528 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races Fo r $32,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STRONG ODOR three wide through the first turn in closest aim of the leader, tracked that rival just off the inside down the backstretch, got given a notch and advanced on the front three furlongs from home, engaged AZIZA head to head at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and seized command straightened away, edged away under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in under late threat and held safe to the finish. CAFE FLEUR (FR) broke out at the start and was corrected, saved ground at the tail of the compact field, remained patiently handled until roused angled four wide into upper stretch, rallied to issue a challenge through the final furlong but was ultimately rebuffed by the top one when latching on that rival as she hit the finish. TASS a bit keen early on under restraint, tracked the pace along the inside patiently handled until let out spinning three wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive running on to the finish to secure the show honors. PEACE SEEKER tracked just off the inside, tipped briefly three wide at the seven-sixteenths before tucking back behind STRONG ODOR midway on the turn, came under coaxing with five-sixteenths to go, angled five wide into upper stretch and weakened. AZIZA established the front and showed the way rated on the pace through sensible splits just off the inside through the first turn before tucking inside down the backstretch, came under challenge for the initial time midway on the far turn, got set down taking the inside route into upper stretch, yielded the front straightened away and weakened through to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Aziza
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated on pace ins, set down ins 1/4, yielded, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Odor
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, advanced 3/8, 2w 1/4p, up, edged away, held safe

ENTRY.NAME: Tass
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit keen early, tracked ins, let out 3w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Peace Seeker
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, tip briefly 3w 7/16, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Cafe Fleur (FR)
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, saved grd at rear, roused 4w uppr, rallied, rebuffed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Bolton Landing S. SARATOGA RACE 4 5 1/2F Turf CR: 81. Stakes Purse 150000. FOR FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Non-Lasix race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $150 each which should accompany the nomination; $750 to pass the entry box and an additional $750 to start. For ho rses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $750 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% to f ifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight 122 lbs. Non-winners of a race other than claiming allowed 2 lbs.; maidens allowed 4 lbs. A presentation will be made to the winning owner. The New York Racing Association reserves the ri ght to transfer this race to the main track. Closed Saturday, August 5, 2023 with 29 Original Nominations and 1 Supplement. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongso
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AMIDST WAVES was fractious in the gate but came away in good order, settled just off the pace, went two then three wide on the turn, rallied four wide into the stretch, made an outside bid at the three-sixteenths, drifted out under a brisk hand-ride near the furlong marker, drifted in under one pop of a right-handed crop outside the sixteenth-pole, was switched to a left-handed crop and straightened out given one pop shortly thereafter, came in while guided in closer to the runner-up in the final sixteenth, was placed under a strong hand-ride at this point, had the rider intimidate that foe while flagging with a left-handed crop in front of that rivals face late and narrowly prevailed. CROWN IMPERIAL was well placed just behind the leader, drafted inside on the turn, was asked while cutting the corner through a clear rail opening at the top of the stretch, made a bid inside of rivals at the three-sixteenths, dueled with the winner in the final furlong, was intimidated by the crop of that opponents rider late and just missed while clear for the place. GRAM hit the inside of the gate at the start, bumped with a rival while put in tight near the five-eighths then steadied, was rated at the rear, raced inside to the two path on the turn, was roused outside the quarter-pole, paused behind horses into upper stretch, altered out inside the three-sixteenths and lacked the needed kick. SHE'S FIRE bumped with a foe while put in tight near the five-eighths then steadied, moved out then stalked the pace on the outside, vied in the two path on the turn, spun three wide into the stretch, batted under a drive past the eighth-pole, swapped leads back and forth in the final furlong and weakened. ASTONESTHROWAWAY was hustled from the gate, moved in front of foes early, showed the way down the backstretch, was asked while inside on the turn, turned into the stretch in the two path, battled under a drive while between foes into the final furlong and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Crown Imperial
ENTRY.COMMENT: well plcd,ins,cut corner,bid3/16,duel,intimidtd by foes crop late

ENTRY.NAME: Amidst Waves
ENTRY.OWNER: Big Tufff Stables Blackridge Stables LLC Black Type Thoroughbreds RA Hill Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate,settled,2-3p,4w1/4,bid,drft out1/8,drft in,duel,up

ENTRY.NAME: Gram
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate,bmpd5/8,stdy,ratd,ins-2p,pause,alter out ins3/16,no kick

ENTRY.NAME: She's Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd 5/8,stdied,stlk outside,2p turn,3p1/4,vied past 1/8,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Astonesthrowaway
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,mvd in early,pace,ins turn,2p1/4,vied past 1/8,tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 79. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CANDIED coaxed from the gate, chased four wide down the backstretch and through the turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled six to seven wide into upper stretch, dug in drifting in two to three paths from the three-sixteenths to the eighth pole, issued a challenge to the leader through the final furlong and was up in the last jumps to prevail. CATHERINE WHEEL chased just off the inside from just off the pace, tucked inside half a mile from home, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, rallied to take command straightened away, inched away under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in under lone threat and was caught in the final strides to the finish. MUNNY ROCKETTE coaxed from the start, led briefly early on before chasing three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung five to six wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages while well clear of the rest to procure the show honors. DANCING NANCY coaxed from the gate, chased three to four wide from just off the pace coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch and weakened. PLATINUM MINIT coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside under a ride from the seven-sixteenths, went six to seven wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals to the finish. BROOKMESA coaxed from the start, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun two to three wide for home, weakened in the stretch. ELLA ELIZABETH broke out at the start and was corrected, then bobbled after the start before ranging up to take over command nearing the five furlong marker, showed the way in hand three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and was displaced from the front straightened away, then tired to the finish. MISCHIEVOUS MISS five paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three then two wide through the turn coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, angled five wide into upper stretch and made no impact. MOST OF ALL coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside, got set down spinning four wide into upper stretch, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Catherine Wheel
ENTRY.OWNER: Schermerhorn Richard Team Hanley Esler Kristen L Esler Matt Hill 'n' Dale Equine
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, to ins 1/2, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, up str away, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Platinum Minit
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed 7/16, angled 6-7w uppr, passed tired

ENTRY.NAME: Most of All
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, set down 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Brookmesa
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 2-3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Candied
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4w, coaxed 7/16, 6-7w uppr, drifted in, up late

ENTRY.NAME: Munny Rockette
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, led briefly, chased 3w, coax 5/16, 5-6w uppr, wknd lte

ENTRY.NAME: Mischievous Miss
ENTRY.OWNER: Hidden Brook Farm and Denholtz Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w backstretch, coaxed 3-2w 3/8, angled 5w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Dancing Nancy
ENTRY.OWNER: LaPenta Robert V and Madaket Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-4w, coaxed 5/16, 6w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Ella Elizabeth
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, bobble after st, in hand 3-2w, 4w uppr, yielded, tire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 81. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. INNER TURF (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MEMORIALIZE broke a step slow then was taken up while forced in, spotted the front a few lengths, went three then four wide on the first turn, settled off the pace, was roused while moving from three to five wide on the final turn, rallied four wide into the stretch, took over inside the three-sixteenths, kicked clear under the crop inside the furlong marker then was placed under a hand-ride while powering away to the finish. STEEL LUTE hesitated at the start and was off a bit slow, settled on the inside, was urged along on the far turn, swung five wide into the stretch, moved in under a drive in the final furlong, came between horses just inside the sixteenth-pole and got up for the place. LAMORNA broke a bit awkwardly and a bit slow then was forced in, rounded the first turn in the two path, was unhurried near the back, angled from three to six wide on the final turn, came five wide into the stretch, chased into the final furlong and proved no match for the winner then missed the place while able to get the show. SNOW DANCE was leaning in when the gate opened then veered in, went around the first turn in the three path, stalked the pace on the outside, was asked while making a bid with three furlongs to run, vied in the two path on the far turn, spun three wide into the stretch, passed the three-sixteenths on even terms for the lead, battled under a drive into the final furlong and weakened. GOODNIGHT MY ANGEL broke a step slow, went three wide on the first turn, was reserved in the middle of the field, traveled three then four wide on the far turn, raced in traffic into upper stretch, lugged in some in the final furlong and lacked the needed response. BUCHU was taken in hand early, saved ground on the first turn, settled near the middle of the field, was asked in the two path on the far turn, bumped soundly with a rival outside the quarter-pole then checked, came under a drive in upper stretch and failed to rally. VICTORY BADGE was forced in at the start while having her path taken and was off a bit slow, spotted the front a few lengths, went four wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, went three then four wide on the far turn, swung seven wide into upper stretch and failed to threaten. CANDY LOVER went to the front, rounded the first turn in the two path, showed the way down the backstretch, was asked while inside on the far turn, spun into the two path at the quarter-pole, lost the advantage in upper stretch and gave way. GROWTH RATE went two to three wide on the first turn, was rated while stalking the pace on the outside, made a bid in the three path on the far turn, steadied at the quarter-pole, dropped back into the final furlong and came up empty. CAUSEWAY'S JEWEL pulled under restraint while a bit keen into the first turn, was rated just off the pace on the inside, saved ground while asked on the far turn, bumped soundly with an opponent outside the quarter-pole then checked sharply and dropped out.

ENTRY.NAME: Steel Lute
ENTRY.COMMENT: off bit slow,settled ins,urged2nd turn,swung 5w1/4,mvd in,up2nd

ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled,keen into 1st,rated inside,bmpd hard1/4,checked,empty

ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand,ins1st,settled,2p2nd,bmpd hard1/4,checked,no rally

ENTRY.COMMENT: forced in brk,bit slow,4w1st,settled out,3-4w2nd,7w1/4,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Snow Dance
ENTRY.COMMENT: veer in brk,3p1st,stlkd out,bid3/8,2p2nd,3p1/4,even3/16,wknd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 101. Allowance Purse 149500. (PURSE $115,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $26,013 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non -winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOUNT UP broke out at the start bumping BRAMITO, prompted the pace of SET SAIL from the outside three wide, advanced to take over command near the quarter pole and spun just off the inside into upper stretch, edged clear to the eighth pole, dug in and held safe to prevail. CHILENO chased four to five wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung five to six wide into upper stretch, surged home outside but was ultimately repelled to the finish. SET SAIL showed the way in hand along the inside under some pressure from MOUNT UP to the outside, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, yielded the front near the quarter pole and angled out four wide in behind the new leader straightened away and weakened in the late stages. SUNDAESWITHSANDY chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide for home, weakened in the stretch. FROMANOTHAMUTHA chased three then two wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, made no headway. PLEDGEOFALLEGIANCE chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the far turn, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled four to five wide for home, offered no response. FENWICK chased four to five wide until tucked three wide into the far turn, got coaxed along at the three-eighths, went five to six wide into upper stretch and weakened. RESERVE CURRENCY chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, went five to six wide into upper stretch, made no impact. BRAMITO bumped at the start by MOUNT UP, who broke outwards, chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the far turn, got coaxed along at the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Set Sail
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand ins, coaxed 3/8, yielded near 1/4, 4w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.OWNER: Sussman Jeremy Ten Strike Racing and Cory Moelis Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 7/16, angled 4-5w upper, no response

ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, prompted 3w, up near 1/4, 2w 1/4p, clear, held safe

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 7/16, 3w upper, no headway

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 89. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIGITIZE went to the front, showed the way with a clear advantage, was challenged while inside to the two path on the turn, responded well when set down in upper stretch, remained on his inside lead while put to a left-handed crop in the final furlong and held under steady urging. SILO RIDGE chased the pace on the outside, went two to three wide on the turn, pursued the winner under a left-handed crop while remaining on his inside lead in the stretch, kept on into the final sixteenth then switched to a right-handed crop and willingly earned the place. MAGICO was urged along towards the rear, went two to three wide on the turn, turned into upper stretch under the crop, gained in the final furlong, moved out around the sixteenth-pole and finished with late energy to garner the show. BLACK RAIN came outward shortly after the start, was urged along on the outside, went four wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch, remained on his inside lead to the sixteenth-pole then swapped to the proper lead and kept on to secure the last spot in the superfecta. QUALITY CHIC bobbled at the start, raced towards the rear, went three to four wide for most of the turn, dropped to the rail outside the quarter-pole and lacked the needed response. SHAKY PANTS was well placed while rated just off the pace, came under urging while moving from the rail to the three path on the turn, chased four wide into the stretch and tired. MACHO VILLA was hustled from the gate then urged along off the pace, went two then three wide on the turn, came four wide into the stretch and was no factor. UNCLECHARLIESGIFT moved up then chased the pace, dropped back leaving the backstretch, came up empty while two then three wide on the turn and retreated. LORD VICENTE (ARG) dropped back near the five-eighths pole then angled in, fell to the rear while inside on the turn and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Shaky Pants
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed,asked ins-3p turn,chased,4w1/4,tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: towards rear,2-3path turn,mvd out 1/16,late energy,up show

ENTRY.NAME: Macho Villa
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,urged along,2-3p turn,4p into lane,no factor

ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up,chased,drop back 7/16,empty 2-3p turn,retreated

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 9 1M Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 50000. INNER TURF (UP TO $8,700 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $35,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Du e At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MONEY SUPPLY coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled three to four wide into upper stretch, got placed in tight between rivals briefly just outside the three-sixteenths, rallied to take command just inside the eighth pole, then edged clear under a drive kept to task. GATE RUNNER chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five then four wide into upper stretch placing MONEY SUPPLY briefly in tight in tandem with FIGHT FIERCELY near the three-sixteenths before being corrected, seized command inside the three-sixteenths, got headed inside the eighth pole, ran on to chase the winner home clear of the rest and along second best. STJAMES chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch, kicked on belatedly to secure the show honors. LEFTEMBEHIND chased along the inside, pulled on the bit and was off heels early on into the backstretch, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch, ran on through to the finish. BOLD LOOKER chased along the inside until tipped to the two path with nine-sixteenths to go, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, went six wide into upper stretch and offered no response. FIGHT FIERCELY chased three wide coming under coaxing near the five-sixteenths when issuing a challenge for command, took over and swung three wide into upper stretch in front narrowly, got headed just inside the three-sixteenths and weakened to the finish. LEGENDARY LORE bobbled at the start recovering inwards and was corrected, led early on before being displaced from command by GOOD RAPPORT seven furlongs out, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch and tired. GOOD RAPPORT coaxed from the gate, tucked to the two path and advanced taking over the front seven furlongs from home, showed the way in hand coming under coaxing near the five-sixteenths under threat to the outside, yielded and spun just off the inside into upper stretch, then tired in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Leftembehind
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 3/8, angled 5w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Stjames
ENTRY.OWNER: Gyarmati Leah Brooklyn Racing Co and Windborne Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 7/16, angled 7w upper, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Legendary Lore
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, led early, chased ins, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Looker
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, tip 2p 9/16, coaxed 7/16, 6w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Money Supply
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3-4w uppr, up ins 1/8, edged cl

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Jeff Little, Teresa Little,Marilyn Little & William Lynn

ENTRY.NAME: Gate Runner
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable and St Elias Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-4w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, angled 5-4w upper, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Good Rapport
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 2p in aim, up 7/18, coaxed 5/16, yielded 2w 1/4, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, up 3w upper, headed ins 3/16, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 10 6F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Claiming Purse 43000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be V oid).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MUDVILLE NINE stalked the pace on the outside, went four wide early on the turn then was carried to the six path, was roused near the quarter-pole, rallied to the lead in upper stretch, shook clear inside the furlong marker and was fully extended to last and prevail. WOODSIDE WARRIOR bumped with a rival while off slow then took a while to get into full stride, spotted the front several lengths, was urged well off the pace, traveled around the turn in the two path, gained coming to the quarter-pole, lacked room behind horses in upper stretch, altered out for room near the eighth-pole, rallied outside in the final furlong and closed determinedly to just miss while well clear for the place. HEY TOBY disputed the pace between foes, vied in the two then three path on the turn, battled under a drive into the final furlong and weakened while able to get the show. CHALKY CAT broke in and bumped with a rival while off a bit slow, was urged along on the outside, gained while moving from the five path to the seven path on the turn, chased under a drive into the final furlong and tired. UNDER THE KNIFE broke very fast, contested the pace on the inside of rivals, vied along the rail on the turn, battled under a drive into the final furlong and also tired. WATCH HILL was off slow and spotted the front a few lengths then was sent hard, saved ground while ridden along and failed to respond. SIN NOMBRE was re-positioned in the gate, pressed the pace on the outside of two foes, vied in the three path early on the turn then floated to the five path, continued five wide to the quarter-pole, was taken in hand in traffic in upper stretch then moved out and had nothing left. MAJESTIC HEART was re-positioned multiple times while restless in the gate, came out slow then dropped well behind, saved ground on the turn and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Watch Hill
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, sent hard, ridden along, inside turn, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Majestic Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: re-positioned gate,restless,off slow,inside turn,trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Under the Knife
ENTRY.OWNER: Englehart Jeffrey S Photos Finish LLC and Bowman Peter C
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke fast,pace ins foes,rail turn,vied past 1/8,tired
